title: Healthcare Platform Web Application
description: This application is designed to empower medical professionals by providing an intuitive platform to explore and investigate the vast array of FDA-regulated drugs currently available on the market.

title: Plant Leaf Image Classification Model (computer vision AI model)
description: Plant diseases significantly impact global agriculture, reducing crop yields and threatening food security, yet traditional detection methods are slow, labor-intensive, and prone to error. To address this, we developed a hybrid pipeline that integrates the Segment Anything Model (SAM) with Vision Transformers (ViT) and ResNet architectures for accurate and robust plant disease detection...

title: Contact Manager Application - Full Stack Developer
description: A dynamic web application that enables users to create, update, and manage their own contact cards.
